markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Ulistul](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1745)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Having replaced over half her body with scavenged and rebuilt parts, Ulistul is a patchwork juggernaut and stubborn survivor. Her pieces are in various colors, making it obvious even from a distance that not all her parts come from the same source.

 Her golemcraft in mortal life and millennia of practice since grant her intuitive understanding of constructs, including ways to subvert or sabotage those machines' programming. When she does fight, it's most often to abduct a scholar or artificer whose talents she craves. In preparation for battle, she replaces her left hand with a long claw that resembles a hooked sword.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Construct](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)): DC 38

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 36

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 33
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Ulistul.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 11">[Ulistul](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1745)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Automaton" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=398" />
<trait label="Construct" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=35" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Monsters of Myth](/Sources.aspx?ID=107) pg. 124</row>

**Perception** +22; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), statuesense (imprecise) 60 feet

**Languages**
[Auran](/Languages.aspx?ID=15), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Jistkan](/Languages.aspx?ID=59), [Osiriani](/Languages.aspx?ID=40), [Terran](/Languages.aspx?ID=22), [Utopian](/Languages.aspx?ID=36); [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) 100 feet

**Skills**
[Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +24, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +21, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +24, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +18, [Jistka Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +24, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +19

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +5

**Con** +5

**Int** +7

**Wis** +5

**Cha** +3
</row>

**Statuesense** ([arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [divination](/Traits.aspx?ID=47)) Ulistul built herself components granting her enhanced senses that can detect the location of other constructs and similar objects. She's aware of any constructs or inanimate statuary at the listed range.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 31 

**Fort** +22 

**Ref** +18 

**Will** +24 

+2 status to all saves vs. effects created by [constructs](/Traits.aspx?ID=35)
</row>

**HP** 165

**Immunities**
bleed, [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9), [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10), [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15), [healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188) attacks, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Resistances**
physical 10 (except [adamantine](/Equipment.aspx?ID=374))

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +23 ([Lawful](/Traits.aspx?ID=99), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d12+12 slashing plus 1d8 fire

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +23 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Lawful](/Traits.aspx?ID=99), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d10+12 bludgeoning plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
energy beam +22 ([Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [Lawful](/Traits.aspx?ID=99), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 2d12+12 fire

**Arcane Innate Spells** DC 30, attack +22
- **Cantrips (6th)**
[Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=190), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280), [Telekinetic Projectile](/Spells.aspx?ID=334)
- **4th**
[Fly](/Spells.aspx?ID=125), [Resilient Sphere](/Spells.aspx?ID=255) (×2), [Shape Stone](/Spells.aspx?ID=276)
- **5th**
[Secret Chest](/Spells.aspx?ID=716), [Sending](/Spells.aspx?ID=272)
- **6th**
[Cloudkill](/Spells.aspx?ID=42), [Slow](/Spells.aspx?ID=289), [Summon Construct](/Spells.aspx?ID=318)
- **Constant (6th)**
[Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66)

**Artificer's Command** <actions string="Free Action" />  **Frequency** once per round; **Effect** Ulistul directs one [construct](/Traits.aspx?ID=35) within 60 feet that can perceive her and has a level lower than hers, delivering helpful commands that improve its capabilities. The construct gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, and saving throws.

**Artificer's Eye** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Divination](/Traits.aspx?ID=47), [Scrying](/Traits.aspx?ID=141)) Ulistul chooses one construct or statue she can currently perceive with a precise sense or with statuesense; usually, her only precise sense is vision. After choosing her target, she begins to perceive the target's surroundings as though she occupied its space. If the target is either an inanimate statue or a mindless creature, she can also verbally interact with nearby creatures (including issuing Artificer's Commands) or cause the target to move subtly, such as moving its mouth. This ability can be sustained indefinitely as long as Ulistul can perceive the target, though her visual stimuli from her own body are harder to process; she's [dazzled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=7) when using her own senses for the effect's duration.

**Dismantler**   Ulistul's attacks against [constructs](/Traits.aspx?ID=35) and objects gain the [deadly d12](/Traits.aspx?ID=174) trait and ignore up to 10 of the target's Hardness and resistances.

**Ivory Dictum** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [Incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93)) Ulistul takes control of a [construct](/Traits.aspx?ID=35) within 30 feet. This has the effects of [_dominate_](/Spells.aspx?ID=87) (DC 32 Will) but can affect mindless creatures and ignores the target's [golem antimagic](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=57), if any.

</column>
name: Ulistul
